channel.title: Not enough money?
channel.description: Ok wel how do i change shop item prices cuase one is to high for players to buy becuase its over max limit...

item.title: Not enough money?
item.dc:creator: @sic_pure sic pure
item.description:
@sic_pure wrote:

[quote=“EmoJuiceBox, post:2, topic:136592”]Find in your server source folder, shops.cfg Change the .cfg to .bat then right click on in and click on edit, there you will see all the shop options prices and names and everything. When you are done editing it double click on it to compile it, make sure it reads exactly “shops.bat” before you can successfully compile it. It should only take a split second to compile. Then right click in the folder and click on “Undo-rename” until it’s back to “shops.cfg” and then go to your compile.bat and compile the server. Now run the server and it should be how you edited it!

=][/quote]

Why the fuck would you change a .cfg to .bat?

Read full topic

item.title: Not enough money?
item.dc:creator: @EmoJuiceBox EmoJuiceBox
item.description:
@EmoJuiceBox wrote:

Find in your server source folder, shops.cfg Change the .cfg to .bat then right click on in and click on edit, there you will see all the shop options prices and names and everything. When you are done editing it double click on it to compile it, make sure it reads exactly “shops.bat” before you can successfully compile it. It should only take a split second to compile. Then right click in the folder and click on “Undo-rename” until it’s back to “shops.cfg” and then go to your compile.bat and compile the server. Now run the server and it should be how you edited it!

=]

Read full topic
